title: Peacock Schedule February 10-16 2025: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added
description: Peacock‘s new TV and movie releases for February 10-16 2025 include Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy and a new episode of The Traitors Season 3. February 13 sees the release of a new episode of The Traitors Season 3. Alan Cumming hosts the latest season, reprising his hosting duties from previous chapters. This new […] The post Peacock Schedule February 10-16 2025: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Abdul Azim Naushad
excerpt: Fans curious about Peacock's schedule for February 10-16 2025 can learn more about the films and shows releasing during the week here.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Peacock‘s new TV and movie releases for February 10-16 2025 include Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy and a new episode of The Traitors Season 3. February 13 sees the release of a new episode of The Traitors Season 3. Alan Cumming hosts the latest season, reprising his hosting duties from previous chapters. This new season features a cast comprised of reality stars and other prominent personalities like Rob Mariano, Sam Asghari, and Nikki Garcia. Also coming out on this day is Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy. The latest installment in the Bridget Jones film franchise, it sees Renée Zellweger’s lovable eponymous character, now a widow and mother of two children, find a new romance in a much younger man, who happens to be her son’s teacher. Supporting cast members include Chiwetel Ejiofor, Leo Woodall, Isla Fisher, and Nico Parker. Also releasing on Peacock this week are several Fast & Furious films. Fast & Furious is a popular action-thriller franchise revolving around Vin Diesel’s Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers, as they crew engage in races, heists, and international government missions. Tyrese Gibson, Michelle Rodriguez, Ludacris, and Sung Kang are among the franchise’s stars. New Peacock releases for February 10-16 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Peacock from February 10-16 2025. February 10 Copshop Mine February 12 The Black Phone February 13 Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy – Premiere (Peacock Original)  Candyman (2021)  Summer House, Season 9 – Premiere (Bravo)  The Traitors, Season 3 – New Episode, 60 min (Peacock Original)  February 14 Southern Charm After Show, Season 1 – Premiere (Bravo) February 15 Fast Five  Fast & Furious 6  Furious 7  Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs Shaw  February 16 Return To Office +  SNL50: The Anniversary Special (NBC)  For more Peacock content, check out the Suits LA trailer. Also, Jennifer Garner’s The Five-Star Weekend has been ordered by the platform.
html:
Peacock‘s new TV and movie releases for February 10-16 2025 include Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy and a new episode of The Traitors Season 3.

February 13 sees the release of a new episode of The Traitors Season 3. Alan Cumming hosts the latest season, reprising his hosting duties from previous chapters. This new season features a cast comprised of reality stars and other prominent personalities like Rob Mariano, Sam Asghari, and Nikki Garcia.

Also coming out on this day is Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy. The latest installment in the Bridget Jones film franchise, it sees Renée Zellweger’s lovable eponymous character, now a widow and mother of two children, find a new romance in a much younger man, who happens to be her son’s teacher. Supporting cast members include Chiwetel Ejiofor, Leo Woodall, Isla Fisher, and Nico Parker.

Also releasing on Peacock this week are several Fast & Furious films. Fast & Furious is a popular action-thriller franchise revolving around Vin Diesel’s Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers, as they crew engage in races, heists, and international government missions. Tyrese Gibson, Michelle Rodriguez, Ludacris, and Sung Kang are among the franchise’s stars.

New Peacock releases for February 10-16 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Peacock from February 10-16 2025.

February 10

  • Copshop
  • Mine

February 12

  • The Black Phone

February 13

  • Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy – Premiere (Peacock Original) 
  • Candyman (2021) 
  • Summer House, Season 9 – Premiere (Bravo) 
  • The Traitors, Season 3 – New Episode, 60 min (Peacock Original) 

February 14

  • Southern Charm After Show, Season 1 – Premiere (Bravo)

February 15

  • Fast Five 
  • Fast & Furious 6 
  • Furious 7 
  • Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs Shaw 

February 16

  • Return To Office + 
  • SNL50: The Anniversary Special (NBC) 

For more Peacock content, check out the Suits LA trailer. Also, Jennifer Garner’s The Five-Star Weekend has been ordered by the platform.
